DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Leg length, see illustration above (= h).

DocAttribute.Name: Width
DocAttribute.Documentation: Leg length, see illustration above (= b). If not given, the value of the Depth attribute is applied to Width.

DocAttribute.Name: Thickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of profile, see illustration above (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1). If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Edge radius according the above illustration (= r2). If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: LegSlope
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slope of leg of the profile. If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInX
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Location of centre of gravity along the x axis measured from the center of the bounding box.
IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute CentreOfGravityInX has been made optional. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInY
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Location of centre of gravity along the Y axis measured from the center of the bounding box.
IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute CentreOfGravityInY has been made optional. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The thickness of the flange has to be smaller than the depth of the profile.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The thickness of the flange has to be smaller than the width of the profile (if given).
